item.description:
What's New in DockFlow 1.61

New Feature

  • Deep Links Integration – DockFlow now supports deep links, allowing you to switch presets directly from other apps. This opens up powerful automation possibilities with apps that support URL schemes.
  • ExtraBar Integration – Seamlessly integrate with our new ExtraBar app to trigger preset switches from your menu bar or other compatible applications.
  • Third-Party App Support – Any app that supports deep links can now communicate with DockFlow, enabling advanced workflow automation.

Bug Fixes

  • macOS Tahoe List View Consistency – Improved list view rendering on macOS Tahoe for a more consistent and polished visual experience.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!
